content.howToPlay: Guide the red square to the end of the maze.Use WASD or arrow keys to move the square.Do not touch any obstacles on the way.Collect all yellow coins to complete a level.Analyze patterns of obstacle movements and find the ideal timing to act.Find safe spots to give the square a short break.You'll see some funny discouraging messages between attempts; ignore them for your own sake.

fullContent: Homeâ€º AvoidWorld's Hardest GameBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenOh, you are courageous, aren't you? Well, avid gamer, you asked for it. Here is the World's Hardest Game ever. It's almost impossible to finish all levels. Be warned: You might rage at your keyboard and break a few things after the first hundred attempts. But winning even a few levels feels like... Actually, we don't know how it feels to win the World's Hardest Game (burst into tears), so we cannot describe you.Â If you trust your gaming skills, maybe you can tell us in the comments, huh? ðŸ¥²What is the World's Hardest Game?World's Hardest Game is a fast-paced obstacle game where you guide a square to the end of the level while avoiding obstacles. The game mechanics are designed to make you rage and quit, so it's better to keep calm and move cautiously.ControlsWASD or the Arrow Keys: Navigate the SquareHow To Play World's Hardest GameGuide the red square to the end of the maze.Use WASD or arrow keys to move the square.Do not touch any obstacles on the way.Collect all yellow coins to complete a level.Analyze patterns of obstacle movements and find the ideal timing to act.Find safe spots to give the square a short break.You'll see some funny discouraging messages between attempts; ignore them for your own sake.The Hardest Level of World's Hardest GameThere are 30 levels in World's Hardest Game. Most would say the 30th is the boss level. However, in our opinion, the 26th level is the one that'll cause the most deaths in the game. The obstacles' speed is at its highest at that level. Here is a screenshot of what the hardest level looks like from someone who managed to play all levels.DeveloperStephen Critoph created World's Hardest Game.What is Next?If you're wondering what's next, well, the answer depends on how your play went. Did you manage to win or not?A.) I won the World's Hardest Game...Congratulations! Even the game gods worship you! Send us a screenshot and tell us how you managed to defeat it in the comments. We'll grab our popcorn and be ready to read your backstory. We will also give you a crown badge in Disqus if you share the screenshots with us in the comments! (No cheating, guys!)B.) Please Take Me To An Easy GameWhat were you thinking anyway? We told you it's a hard game. But you were up for sitting on the edge of your seat for hours, breaking keyboards and punching the screen in rage. Anyway, we have dozens of games to relieve the stress on your shoulders.
